Name: Brazilian Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The distinctive character of cachaça bursts through the fruit in this twist on the contemporary classic.
History: For more recipes, origins and history behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail, see our Cosmopolitan page .
Nutrition: One serving of Brazilian Cosmopolitan contains 146 calories
